name: Camel Trophy
overview: Created in 1986 by Tequila, it consists of four subgames: 1) Drop the package on the target via plane for the man to pick up. 2) Drive the van without hitting the rocks. 3) Refuel the van before the timer runs out (by pressing left/right continuously). 4) Drive the van without going too fast (or it crashes on the rocky terrain) before the timer runs out.
